original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 15.25. Hetusahetukadukādi, Kusalattika
analyzed: hetu sa hetuka duka ādi kusala ttika

original: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa dhammassa
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa ca iva na ahetukassa ca na kusalassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo naahetukassa ceva
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na ahetukassa ca iva

original: nana ca hetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko
analyzed: na na ca hetussa na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ

original: ca kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa ca naahetukassa ceva
analyzed: ca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa ca iva na ahetukassa ca na kusalassa ca na ahetukassa ca iva

original: nana ca hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na na ca hetussa na kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo naahetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa
analyzed: sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na ahetukassa ca iva na na ca hetussa na kusalassa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa

original: ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sahetuko ceva
analyzed: ca iva na ahetukassa ca na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva

original: na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa ca naahetukassa
analyzed: na ca hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa ca iva na ahetukassa ca na kusalassa ca na ahetukassa

original: ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca iva na na ca hetussa na kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ kusalo ca sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā na hetussa

original: ceva naahetukassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko
analyzed: ca iva na ahetukassa na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetuko

original: kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā naahetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa
analyzed: kusalo ca sa hetuko ca iva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā na ahetukassa ca iva na na ca hetussa

original: nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko
analyzed: na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ kusalo ca sa hetuko

original: ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa ceva naahetukassa nakusalassa ca naahetukassa
analyzed: ca iva na ca hetu kusalaḥ ca dhammā na hetussa ca iva na ahetukassa na kusalassa ca na ahetukassa

original: ceva nana hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca iva na na hetussa na kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye natthiyā vigate nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye natthiyā vigate nava

original: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa naakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Etena upāyena nava pañhā kātabbā.)
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa ca iva na ahetukassa na akusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ etena upāyena nava pañhā kātabbā

original: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare upanissaye natthiyā vigate nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe nava anantare samanantare upanissaye natthiyā vigate nava

original: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Nava pañhā kātabbā.)
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa ca iva na ahetukassa ca na abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ nava pañhā kātabbā

original: Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava
